Desc.value: The function runs k2_MaskTable for every table in the LU Database

This function will mask (obfuscate) the iTable fields based on an encryption taken from the trnMasking translation..
The function will preapre SQL Update statement(s) to update the iTable.
It will check the ENCRYPTION field in the translation, if it's a number value, the function will use that number to encrypt the field by calling the fnMaskNumber function.
If the value is a function name, this function will call that function on the field and it will be that function's job to mask it.

FunctionBody.value:
String res;
//String parserStartTime = fnUpdateParserStartTime("MERCHANT_UPDATE_LIST");
String updateStartDate = null;
String updateEndDate = null;
java.text.DateFormat dateFormat = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
java.util.Calendar startDate = java.util.Calendar.getInstance();

//Rivi - Need to be changed back to -2 just for testing -30
//startDate.add(java.util.Calendar.DATE, -60);
startDate.add(java.util.Calendar.DATE, -2);    
java.util.Calendar endDate = java.util.Calendar.getInstance();
endDate.add(java.util.Calendar.DATE, 0);    
updateStartDate = dateFormat.format(startDate.getTime());
updateEndDate = dateFormat.format(endDate.getTime());
res = updateEndDate;
reportUserMessage("Start date ="+updateStartDate+",End Date ="+updateEndDate);

String k2RegionPrefix = "";
String payee = "";
if(!k2RegionPrefix.equals("US_") && !k2RegionPrefix.equals("CA_")){
 payee = "" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMPAESQ_PYMT_NAME" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" ;
}

res= " SELECT " +
"	MRCH_NBR," +
"	MAX(DW_UPDT_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
" FROM (" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM B.MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(A.DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMCHNSQ_CHAIN_PARM As A" +
"	Inner Join ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMMSTSQ_MASTER As B " +
"		On A.CORPORATE = B.CORPORATE " +
"		And A.REGION = B.REGION " +
"		And A.PRINCIPAL = B.PRINCIPAL " +
"		And A.ASSOCIATE =  B.ASSOCIATE " +
"		And A.CHAIN = B.CHAIN" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION " +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMMSTSQ_MASTER" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMIDXSQ_IDX" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMAADSQ_ADDL_ADDRESS" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMADDSQ_ADDRESS_INDEX" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMMADSQ_ADDRESS_MASTER" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMCSLSQ_CARD_SERVICELEVEL" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMDDASQ_DDA" +
"	GROUP BY 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMEMLSQ_EMAIL" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMIDXAP_IDX_AP" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMINTSQ_IDX_INTEGRITY" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMOFFSQ_OFFICER" +
"	Group By 1" +
"" +
"	UNION" +
payee +
"" +
"	Select " +
"		TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM MERCHANT) AS MRCH_NBR," +
"		MAX(DW_UPDATE_DTM) AS DW_UPDT_DTM" +
"	From " +
"		ADMIN.VW_" + k2RegionPrefix + "MMOWNSQ_OWNER" +
"	Group By 1) TMP" +
" where DW_UPDT_DTM > '"+ startDate +"' and DW_UPDT_DTM < '"+ endDate +"' Group by 1";

reportUserMessage(res);
return res;

$GLOBALS['k2']['objectName'] = '';

Desc.value: The function runs k2s_MaskTable for every table in the LU Database

This function will mask (obfuscate) a field based on the $iEncryption value.
It will add the value of the first number of the $iEncryption number to the ASCII value 
of the first character of the $iFieldValue and translate it back to its Char value.

Comment.value: The value of the field on which to apply the masking
The encryption to be used to mask the value

Desc.value:
This function will mask (obfuscate) the iTable fields based on an encryption taken from the trnMasking translation..
The function will preapre SQL Update statement(s) to update the iTable.
It will check the ENCRYPTION field in the translation, if it's a number value, the function will use that number to encrypt the field by calling the fnMaskNumber function.
If the value is a function name, this function will call that function on the field and it will be that function's job to mask it.

This function generates an email with the format:<maskedFirstName>.<maskedLastName>@<originalDomain>
MAke sure to run the masking of the first and last names before calling this function.

Comment.value: Table containing the first and last names

Desc.value:
This function will generate a valid Credit Card Number based on a given length and prefix information.
It uses the Modulus 10 algorithm to determine the validity of the number.

Comment.value: A Random valid Credit Card Number

Desc.value: This function will generate a random valid EIN number.

This function will generate a masked SSN.
If the input parameter of $iSSN has 9 digits, the function will generate a valid masked SSN for it.
If the input parameter of $iSSN doesn't have 9 digits (which means it's not a vlid SSN) the function will create a random number in the same size of the $iSSN.

This function will return the City name based on the input Zip Code.
The function will translate the City name using the refZipCodes Global Container

FunctionBody.value:
// Get the City name from the hcZipCodes Global Container.
return (String)DBSelectValue(DB_INTERFACE_NAME, "SELECT primary_city FROM refZipCodes WHERE zip="+'"'+iZip+'"', null);

Comment.value: The Zip Code based on which to return the city name

Desc.value: This function will return a random value between iMin and iMax.

FunctionBody.value:
//return random number in the range [iMin,iMax]
return new Random().nextInt(iMax - iMin + 1) + iMin;

Desc.value:
This function will mask a value based on a list of reference data existing in K2View in a form of either a table (ivv,vc or gc) or a Translation.
The funcion will identify where the reference data is located based on the iObject input value and what is the key that holds the information based on the $iKey input value;
Then it will randomly select a different masked value from the reference list per each iValueToMask input value provided 
and will linked between the two values so if the same $iValueToMask if provided the same masked value will be returned.
Note: This function does not use Shared Memory to store the information.

Comment.value: The type of the K2 Object that will be used to reference the data ('Table' or 'Translation').
The name of the key/field to use as reference in the iObject.

Desc.value:
This function will return the State name based on the input Zip Code.
The function will translate the State name using the refZipCodes Global Container.

FunctionBody.value:
// Get the City name from the hcZipCodes Global Container.
return (String)DBSelectValue(DB_INTERFACE_NAME,"SELECT state FROM refZipCodes WHERE zip="+'"'+iZip+'"',null);

Comment.value: The Zip Code based on which to return the city name

Desc.value: This function will mask a Company EIN by randomly masking every digit in the EIN expect the '-' sign.

Comment.value: The Encryption to use to mask the EIN

Desc.value:
This function will generate a valid masked Credit Card number based on the type of the card.
Currently the following card types are supported: 
   * Visa
   * MasterCard
   * American Express (Amex)
   * Discover
   * Diners
   * Jcb
   * enRoute
   * Voyager
   * Solo
   * Maestro
   * Switch
The function will first check if that specific credit card was already masked previously and will return the masked value if it was.
Otherwise it will generate a new masked valid credit card and will return it.

FunctionBody.value: return fnGetRandomNumber(350,850);

Desc.value:
This function will mask the DOB (Date of Birth) by simply adding or substracting number of days from its DOB.
The function will add a random number between 0 and the iDays value to the iDOB if iOperation is +, and will substract them if iOperation is -.

Comment.value: + to add days, - to substract days

Desc.value: This function will mask an Email Address by randomly masking every letter in the email address expect . and @ signs.

Comment.value: The Encryption to use to mask the Email Address

Desc.value:
This function will mask an input field using the iEncryption Key.
It will randomly generate the encryption.

This function will mask an input field using the iEncryption Key.
It will randomly generate the encryption.

This function will choose a new masked SSN from the gcSSN based on the iSSN.
The function will transform the SSN into a number and run modulo on it based on the NUM_OF_RAND_SSN global.
The new value will be used as the key of the gcSSN for the new SSN.

Comment.value: The Encryption to use to mask the SSN

Desc.value:
This function is used for masking a given field with a constant value.
Simply returns the input value.

FunctionBody.value: return iStaticValue;

Comment.value: A constant value that will be used for masking the field

Desc.value:
This function will mask an input value by either an input encryption or a random one.
The function supports the following inputs:
[1] iValue: The value to mask.
[2] iEncryption: Can be either the word "Random" or a number.
   If the first, the function will generate a random number to be used as the encryption.
   If the latter, the function will use the provided number as the encryption.
[3] iSharedMemoryObject: Represents the name of the object as it will be stored in the Shared Memory.

Comment.value: The Encryption to use to mask the EIN
The object that stores the Shared Memory for this value

Desc.value:
This function will mask an input value by either an input encryption or a random one.
The function supports the following inputs:
[1] iValue: The value to mask.
[2] iEncryption: Can be either the word "Random" or a number.
   If the first, the function will generate a random number to be used as the encryption.
   If the latter, the function will use the provided number as the encryption.
[3] iSharedMemoryObject: Represents the name of the object as it will be stored in the Shared Memory.

Comment.value: The Encryption to use to mask the EIN
The object that stores the Shared Memory for this value

Desc.value:
This function will mask a US ZIP code using the iEncryption Key.
The function will find the entry index of the Zip Code in the full list of all available US Zip Codes,
Then it will add the Encryption value to the index value and modulo it based on the number of available US Zip Codes.
The new value is used as the index of the new Zip Code which will be returned.

Comment.value: The encryption used to mask the Zip Code

Desc.value:
This function will mask a US ZIP code using the iEncryption Key.
The function will find the entry index of the Zip Code in the full list of all available US Zip Codes,
Then it will add the Encryption value to the index value and modulo it based on the number of available US Zip Codes.
The new value is used as the index of the new Zip Code which will be returned.

Comment.value: The encryption used to mask the Zip Code

Desc.value: This function will create a physical file based on an input string.

Comment.value: The string to create the file based on
The name of the file to be created
The location where to place the file in
If set to 1, the content of the i_fileContent will be appended to an existing file

Desc.value: get the list of all files matching file_regExp in a specific path
Absolute value
Round fractions up - Returns the next highest integer value by rounding up value if necessary.
Round fractions down - returns the next lowest integer value by rounding down value if necessary.
minus one parameter from another to get a result
Modulo of a number
k2_Multiply two numbers to get a result
sum up to five parameters to get a result
Rounds a float - Returns the rounded value of val to specified precision (number of digits after the decimal point). precision can also be negative or zero (default).

Desc.value: Concatenate upto 5 strings with defined delimiter
when the input is null return the value entered, else return the input itself
Strip whitespace (or other characters) from the beginning of a string
This function will pad the i_pad_string to i_str according to i_pad_length

Comment.value: The i_pad_string may be truncated if the required number of padding characters can't be evenly divided by the pad_string's length
If the value of i_pad_length is negative, less than, or equal to the length of the input string, no padding takes place.
Optional argument i_pad_type can be STR_PAD_RIGHT, STR_PAD_LEFT, or STR_PAD_BOTH. If pad_type is not specified it is assumed to be STR_PAD_RIGHT

Make a string lowercase
Make a string uppercase
Strip whitespace (or other characters) from the beginning and end of a string
get the current instance ID

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "PATIENT_ID" AS "queryCol_0","SSN" AS "queryCol_1","FIRST_NAME" AS "queryCol_2","LAST_NAME" AS "queryCol_3","ADDRESS" AS "queryCol_4","CITY" AS "queryCol_5","ZIP" AS "queryCol_6","STATE" AS "queryCol_7","COUNTRY" AS "queryCol_8" FROM (SELECT * FROM PATIENT)  WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID

PATIENT.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."PATIENT" ("PATIENT_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"SSN" TEXT   ,"FIRST_NAME" TEXT   ,"LAST_NAME" TEXT   ,"ADDRESS" TEXT   ,"CITY" TEXT   ,"ZIP" TEXT   ,"STATE" TEXT   ,"COUNTRY" TEXT    , PRIMARY KEY("PATIENT_ID"))

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "PATIENT_ID" AS "queryCol_0","ALERGY_ID" AS "queryCol_1","MEDICATION_ALLERGY" AS "queryCol_2","DISCOVERED_DATE" AS "queryCol_3" FROM (SELECT * FROM ALLERGIES)  WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID

ALLERGIES.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."ALLERGIES" ("PATIENT_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"ALERGY_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"MEDICATION_ALLERGY" TEXT   ,"DISCOVERED_DATE" TEXT    , PRIMARY KEY("ALERGY_ID"))

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "PATIENT_ID" AS "queryCol_0","ALCOHOL_DRUG_ABUSE" AS "queryCol_1","ALLERGIES" AS "queryCol_2","ASTHMA" AS "queryCol_3","CANCER" AS "queryCol_4","DEPRESSION" AS "queryCol_5","HEART_DISEASE" AS "queryCol_6","HIGH_BLOOD_PRESSURE" AS "queryCol_7","HIGH_CHOLESTEROL" AS "queryCol_8","MENTAL_ILLNESS" AS "queryCol_9","STROKE" AS "queryCol_10","SMOKER" AS "queryCol_11","EXERCISE_REGULARLY" AS "queryCol_12" FROM (SELECT * FROM FAMILY_HISTORY)  WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID

FAMILY_HISTORY.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."FAMILY_HISTORY" ("PATIENT_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"ALCOHOL_DRUG_ABUSE" REAL  NOT NULL ,"ALLERGIES" REAL   ,"ASTHMA" REAL   ,"CANCER" REAL   ,"DEPRESSION" REAL   ,"HEART_DISEASE" REAL   ,"HIGH_BLOOD_PRESSURE" REAL   ,"HIGH_CHOLESTEROL" REAL   ,"MENTAL_ILLNESS" REAL   ,"STROKE" REAL   ,"SMOKER" REAL   ,"EXERCISE_REGULARLY" REAL    , PRIMARY KEY("PATIENT_ID"))

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "PATIENT_ID" AS "queryCol_0","POLICY_ID" AS "queryCol_1","VALID_FROM" AS "queryCol_2","VALID_TO" AS "queryCol_3","STATUS" AS "queryCol_4","PROVIDE" AS "queryCol_5","PLAN" AS "queryCol_6" FROM (SELECT * FROM INSURANCE_INFORMATION)  WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID

INSURANCE_INFORMATION.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."INSURANCE_INFORMATION" ("PATIENT_ID" TEXT   ,"POLICY_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"VALID_FROM" TEXT   ,"VALID_TO" TEXT   ,"STATUS" TEXT   ,"PROVIDE" TEXT   ,"PLAN" TEXT    , PRIMARY KEY("POLICY_ID"))

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "PATIENT_ID" AS "queryCol_0","INVOICE_ID" AS "queryCol_1","ISSUED_DATE" AS "queryCol_2","DUE_DATE" AS "queryCol_3","STATUS" AS "queryCol_4","BALANCE" AS "queryCol_5" FROM (SELECT * FROM INVOICE)  WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID

INVOICE.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."INVOICE" ("PATIENT_ID" TEXT   ,"INVOICE_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"ISSUED_DATE" TEXT   ,"DUE_DATE" TEXT   ,"STATUS" TEXT   ,"BALANCE" REAL    , PRIMARY KEY("INVOICE_ID"))

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "INVOICE_ID" AS "queryCol_0","PAYMENT_ID" AS "queryCol_1","ISSUED_DATE" AS "queryCol_2","STATUS" AS "queryCol_3","AMOUNT" AS "queryCol_4" FROM (SELECT * FROM PAYMENT)  WHERE "INVOICE_ID" = :INVOICE_ID

PAYMENT.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."PAYMENT" ("INVOICE_ID" TEXT   ,"PAYMENT_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"ISSUED_DATE" TEXT   ,"STATUS" TEXT   ,"AMOUNT" TEXT    , PRIMARY KEY("PAYMENT_ID"))

tablePopulationObjects.sourceDBObjectSelectStatement: SELECT "PATIENT_ID" AS "queryCol_0","VISIT_ID" AS "queryCol_1","VISIT_DATE" AS "queryCol_2","STATUS" AS "queryCol_3","PHYSICIAN" AS "queryCol_4","DIAGNOSIS" AS "queryCol_5" FROM (SELECT * FROM VISIT)  WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID

VISIT.ludbCreateStatementToObject: CREATE TABLE "PATIENT"."VISIT" ("PATIENT_ID" TEXT   ,"VISIT_ID" TEXT  NOT NULL ,"VISIT_DATE" TEXT   ,"STATUS" TEXT   ,"PHYSICIAN" TEXT   ,"DIAGNOSIS" TEXT    , PRIMARY KEY("VISIT_ID"))

ludbRootInfoArray.checkIfEntityExistsOnSourceSqlStatement: SELECT PATIENT_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM PATIENT) WHERE "PATIENT_ID" = :PATIENT_ID
